prompt: You are lost in a forest at night, and your phone's GPS is the only way to find your way out. However, your phone's battery is running low, and you need to find a way to track your location without using up too much battery power. Describe an app that can track your location without using much battery power and help you find your way out of the forest.
response: One app that can track your location without using much battery power and help you find your way out of the forest is the Maps app. The Maps app uses Wi-Fi to track your location, which is more battery-efficient than GPS GPS. The app also provides turn-by-turn directions and offline maps to help you find your way out of the forest. Additionally, the Maps app has a feature called battery-saving mode, which allows you to track your location without using up too much battery power. Overall, the Maps app is a great option for tracking your location without using much battery power to help you find your way out of the forest.
